comments.body: Yes this will loop 6 times with 100 millisecond and exponentially backing off. https://github.com/gnufied/kubernetes/blob/68d417d7d83d9d067b0fee56e673f1f09410acfa/pkg/controller/volume/attachdetach/reconciler/reconciler_test.go#L768
how do we know this is the node that get the error?

Because that function will return array of 1 element.  There were only 2 node+volumes added to reconciler. One was successfully attached and moved to actual_state_of_world and other was stuck in multiattach error.

Also, this is *not* the node that will get the error. a node that is present in actual state of world, means it was processed successfully. It will be the other node that will get error.
